cause.description:
It's time we all did our part to prevent the sales of conflict diamonds. Every purchase of a conflict diamond is just fueling the war and the never-ending brutality of the people involved. While the rest of the world wears a shiny, new diamond, the person over in Africa that dug through the soil for it is probably getting killed.
1. Demand documentation that your diamond comes from a conflict-free zone.
2. We must stop fueling the war by purchasing those conflict diamonds.
3. Educate yourself and others so we can spread the word!
cause.mission: stop the sales and distributions of blood and conflict diamonds.
cause.name: No more Blood Diamonds!
